name: AIsteroids
description:
You need to steer the ship, shoot at asteroids, and collect the pieces, but you can't do all three at once.  Pick one, and let the ship's AI deal with the other two.

Controls:

Steering: mouse to point in a certain direction, hold down the mouse to thrust

Shooting: mouse to aim, hold down the mouse to fire

Claw: click to shoot the claw at your mouse.  You can only collect asteroids below a certain size.

Press 1 to steer, 2 to shoot, and 3 to extend your claw.  The other two will be handled by the computer.  Press 4 to let the computer take full control.

Art from Kenney.

For Linux users, WINE does not seem to work, but proton does and I'm too lazy to upload a linux build.
